title: DevOps Engineer
description:
We inspire purpose-filled living that brings joy to the modern home. With a team of more than 8,000 associates spanning 130 store and distribution locations across the U.S. and Canada, we achieve together, drive results and innovate to inspire. Drawn together by a shared passion for our customers and a spirit of fun, we deliver high-quality home furnishings that are expertly designed, responsibly sourced and bring beauty and function to peopleâ€™s homes. From the day we opened our first store in Chicago in 1962 to the digital innovations that engage millions of customers today, our iconic brand is over 60 years in the makingâ€”and our story is still unfolding.  

Weâ€™re here for it. We think you should be too. Weâ€™re looking for a driven professional with an inclusive mindset to join our team as a **DevsOps Engineer****.**  

A DevOps Engineer will collaborate to manage infrastructure projects and processes. They will be part of a team supporting production, monitoring, and operations for our retail websites. They should have strong intellectual curiosity to analyze and interpret the data to improve website performance.  

This role is an **Individual Contributor** position which can be worked fully **remote**. **A day in the life as a DevOps Engineerâ€¦**  

* Analyze applicable key performance indicators (KPIs) to help optimize application performance.
* Provide governance over access to production data and database in order to safeguard customer and other sensitive data.
* Oversee software deployments for web development, ensuring deployments meet standards required for implementation: unit testing, automated unit testing, regression testing and code reviews.
* Maintain website security optimizations to our Web Application Firewall (WAF) and Bot detection.
* Build, manage, maintain website infrastructure in Amazon Web Services (AWS)
* Monitor application performance using real user monitoring, synthetic monitoring and waterfall data.
* Provide recommendations on what could be done to improve deployments, governance and environments.
* Make existing processes, infrastructure, applications reliable, scalable, secure, and automated where appropriate
* Provide regular reporting on each deployment indicating number of applications intended for deployment, number actually deployed, any incidents arising during or following the implementation.

 **What youâ€™ll bring to the tableâ€¦**  

* Keen attention to detail, strong analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and solid knowledge base are essential.
* Responsible for multitasking and dealing with multiple urgent situations at a time, Devops Engineers must be extremely flexible.
* Experience with automated build CI/CD pipelines and deployment tools, configuration management (e.g. Teamcity, Octopus Deploy) to provide a secure deployment environment.
* Programming skills with at least one language, which may include a scripting language, such as .NET C#, Powershell
* Work with website hosting entity and third party service providers to coordinate deployments.
* Possess a complete understanding of applicable company systems, policies and procedures.
* Maintain an awareness of loss prevention, security and safety following the guidelines provided by management or the Human Resources Department and/or as outlined in the Crate and Barrel/CB2 Associate Guide.
* Communicate effectively and efficiently with all company associates and business contacts.
* Promote a strong sense of teamwork by working together safely, effectively, respectfully and efficiently with all associates.
* Prefer experience in CDN - (Akamai), APM - Application Performance Monitoring (New Relic), Log Aggregator (Sumo Logic), Lambda, NGINX, JIRA, BitBucket, Docker/containers, Linux
* Strong reading and written language skills (English), math skills, interpersonal skills, telephone presence, data entry skills, problem solving skills and analytical skills
* Ability to organize and prioritize workload to meet deadlines, multitask
* Strong system skills, relational databases and query languages

 **Weâ€™d love to hear from you if you haveâ€¦**  

* 3+ years in a production software development/deployment environment
* 1+ years web development experience, with at least some DevOps experience
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or comparable work experience
* Experience in Cloud providers such as AWS desired

  

#li-remote **Minimum Starting Rate:** $80,000.00 Annually  

  

**Up to:** $100,000.00 Annually  

  

Pay ranges will be adjusted upward as needed to comply with applicable state and local law. In addition to your salary, based on your role, associates may be eligible for other compensation including bonuses, sales incentives, and long term incentives.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
We are looking for an ***experienced Fullstack Developer*** who is highly skilled in **Next.js** and **Node.js** to take charge of developing and maintaining high-performance web applications. As a key team member, you will work on complex projects, ensuring the highest standards of code quality, performance, and security.

**Responsibilities:**

* Lead the development and optimization of web applications using **Next.js** and **Node.js**.
* Implement new features and maintain existing applications with a focus on scalability and performance.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and back-end developers, to deliver robust solutions.
* Ensure the security and efficiency of all web applications.
* Provide technical leadership and mentoring to junior developers.
* Conduct code reviews and adhere to best practices in development.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues across the full stack promptly.

**Requirements:**

* Extensive experience with **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **PHP**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**.
* Proven ability to develop scalable, high-performance web applications.
* Strong experience with version control systems, such as Git.
* In-depth understanding of web development principles, including responsive design and mobile-first development.
* Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
* Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

**Preferred Skills:**

* Experience with databases (SQL or NoSQL).
* Familiarity with deploying applications on cloud platforms.
* Knowledge of API development and integration.

**Why Join Us:**

* Be part of an innovative and fast-paced environment.
* Work on challenging and impactful projects.
* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunities for growth and advancement.

title: JavaScript Developer
description:
**Overview**
The JavaScript Developer Intern position is a vital role within our development team, providing an excellent opportunity for aspiring developers to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic environment. This internship will immerse candidates in real-world software development projects, allowing them to apply their academic knowledge and grow their technical skills in JavaScript and other web technologies. Interns will work closely with experienced developers, contributing to the creation of interactive and user-friendly web applications. This role is essential to supporting our ongoing projects and introducing fresh perspectives, enabling our team to innovate and fine-tune our digital solutions. Furthermore, this internship serves as an important stepping stone for building a foundation for a future career in web development or related fields, equipping interns with the tools and experiences they need to succeed in today's competitive job market.
  

  

**Key Responsibilities**

* Assist in the development and maintenance of web applications using JavaScript.
* Collaborate with team members to design and implement new features.
* Write clear, well-structured, and reusable code following best practices.
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
* Debug and troubleshoot issues in existing applications.
* Test applications for performance, responsiveness, and usability.
* Integrate APIs to enhance functionality.
* Learn and apply new frameworks or libraries as required.
* Help to optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Document development processes and code changes.
* Attend team meetings to discuss project updates and goals.
* Provide support to other team members as needed.
* Conduct research on emerging trends in web development technologies.
* Assist in creating user interface components using HTML and CSS.
* Participate in problem-solving sessions to enhance functionality.

**Required Qualifications**

* Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
* Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
* Familiarity with version control using Git.
* Exposure to web development frameworks (e.g., React, Angular) is a plus.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
* Strong verbal and written communication skills.
* Eagerness to learn new technologies and methodologies.
* Time management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks.
* Experience with online coding challenges or programming projects is a plus.
* Knowledge of browser developer tools for debugging.
* Familiarity with responsive design techniques.
* Willingness to take initiative and suggest improvements.
* Understanding of RESTful APIs and AJAX.
* Previous internship experience or personal projects related to web development is advantageous.
* Positive attitude and enthusiasm for technology.

Skills: web,nextjs,css,react,responsive design,ajax,version control (git),web development,angular,restful apis,team collaboration,html,javascript,version control,projects

title: Front-End Developer-Remote
description:
**Job Title:**
**Front-End Developer**
**Experience:**
6-8 years
  

  

**Job Type: Remote**
. (Preferred location Chennai / Bangalore / Hyderabad)
  

  

**Job Summary**
We are looking for an experienced
**Front-End Developer with 6-8 years of experience**
in building interactive and responsive web applications. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in modern front-end technologies, UI frameworks, and RESTful API integrations. The candidate must be proficient in JavaScript libraries, front-end frameworks, and asynchronous request handling.
  

  

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design, develop, and maintain scalable front-end applications.
* Implement JavaScript libraries and frameworks to enhance application functionality.
* Work with Angular 7 or 11 to build robust front-end solutions.
* Develop and maintain HTML 5.0, CSS 3.0, and Bootstrap-based responsive designs.
* Utilize jQuery for DOM manipulation and UI enhancements.
* Implement asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX to improve application performance.
* Develop RESTful services and integrate with back-end APIs.
* Optimize UI performance and improve front-end security best practices.
* Utilize Entity Framework for front-end integration with back-end services.
* Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces.
* Troubleshoot and debug front-end issues to improve overall application performance.
* Stay updated with the latest front-end technologies and trends.

**Required Skills & Experience**

* 6-8 years of experience in front-end development.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, and jQuery.
* Experience working with Angular 7 or 11 for web application development.
* Strong knowledge of asynchronous programming, AJAX, and RESTful API integration.
* Familiarity with Entity Framework and working with back-end services.
* Experience with version control systems such as Git.
* Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Experience with modern front-end build tools and workflow automation.
* Knowledge of TypeScript and state management libraries (e.g., Redux, NgRx).
* Exposure to cloud-based applications and deployment practices.

If you are a passionate Front-End Developer looking for an opportunity to work on exciting projects, we encourage you to apply.
  

  

Skills: javascript libraries and framework,css,jquery,git,ui development,html,angular 7,entity framework,restful webservices,redux,javascript,restful api integration,ngrx,angular 11,angular 7 or 11,css 3,typescript,bootstrap,ajax,html 5
